landText: Innovative Second-Hand Products, Enjoy the Savings!
termsText: By signing up, I accept the terms and conditions, confirm that I have read the privacy policy, and that I am at least 18 years old.
youneedtoconfirm: You need to confirm before proceeding.
usernameLengthError: Username must be at least 3 characters.
usernameAlphabeticError: Username must contain only English letters.
passwordShouldContainMinimum8Characters: Password must contain at least 8 characters.
tellusyourself: Tell us about yourself and your style
phonenumberusedtext: Your phone number will be used to help you log in. It will not be publicly shared or used for marketing purposes.
tellyouclosingaccount: Tell us why you are closing your account
iconfirmtransactionscompleted: I confirm all my transactions are completed
deleteaccounttext: If you delete your account, it will be immediately deactivated. Deactivated accounts can only be seen by our team before being permanently deleted as stated in the Privacy Policy.
usernameruletext: Username must be at least 3 characters long and contain only Latin letters.
nameLengthError: Your name must be at least 2 characters long.
nameAlphabeticError: Your name must contain only English letters.
photoslimit: You can upload up to 20 product images.
title: Product Title
egdescribe: e.g. worn only a few times, fits size S
holidaymode_explanation_body: When holiday mode is enabled, all your listings will be temporarily hidden. This means potential buyers will not be able to see your listings or contact you. This feature is useful when you are on vacation or temporarily not selling.
holidaymode_explanation_note: Note: When you turn off holiday mode, all your listings will automatically become visible again.
faqtext: Find answers to all your questions here.
aitext: You can visit for anything on your mind.
whatsapptext: Need support? Contact us via our WhatsApp line!
emailtext: Need support? Contact us via our email address!
faq_answer_1: Yes, our app is completely free. There are no charges for usage.
faq_question_2: Do I need to pay to post an ad?
faq_answer_2: No, you do not need to make any payments to post an ad. All ads can be posted for free.
faq_question_3: How can I shop through the app?
faq_answer_3: Our app is only for listing ads. Buyers and sellers communicate with each other directly to complete transactions.
faq_question_4: Does the app charge a commission fee?
faq_answer_4: No, our app does not take any commission fees. All transactions happen directly between users.
faq_question_5: Is there a limit to posting ads?
faq_answer_5: No, you can post as many ads as you want. However, there may be some restrictions to prevent misuse.
faq_question_6: How can I shop safely on the app?
faq_answer_6: Our app only provides a platform. For safe shopping, we recommend meeting the seller in person and checking the product before purchasing.
faq_question_7: What should I do if I have a complaint about a user?
faq_answer_7: There is a 'Report' button in the app. You can submit your complaint using this button.
faq_question_8: How can I highlight my ad?
faq_answer_8: Our app does not have a paid promotion option. However, you can attract more attention by regularly updating your ad and providing detailed information.
faq_question_9: Is messaging possible through the app?
faq_answer_9: Yes, our app allows users to message each other. This enables buyers and sellers to communicate directly.
faq_question_10: I accidentally deleted my ad. Can I recover it?
faq_answer_10: Unfortunately, deleted ads cannot be restored. You will need to create a new ad.
underusedtext: Product has been used, in good condition
pleasefillinallrequiredfields: You must fill in all required fields!
noconnectiontext:
Connection is currently unavailable.
Please try again.
buyerprotectiontext: In-app messaging provides a secure shopping experience. Please avoid sharing personal information. According to our buyer protection policy, all communications must be conducted through in-app messaging.
selectsizetext: Select the size that fits you.
newwithtagsdesc: Tagged or in its original packaging, never used.
newwithouttagsdesc: Not tagged or missing original packaging, never used.
verygooddesc: Lightly used, may have minor flaws but still looks great. Mention any flaws in photos and description.
gooddesc: Used, may show signs of wear and flaws. Mention any flaws in photos and description.
satisfactorydesc: Heavily used, shows signs of wear and flaws. Mention any flaws in photos and description.
sharetext: Look what I discovered on the app!
